overview:
Meghan Young is a book reviewer and freelance editor and writer, who is also currently working as the Marketing Geek at Expensify, Inc.

Traditionally a freelance writer and editor, Meghan founded Parliament Books in 2009 both to host her freelance services and to provide a book reviewing outlet. She has edited everything from business plans to play scripts, and many an article, resume, web site, and press release in between. She studied English with minors in Biblical Literature and Theater, and a Writing concentration, graduating with a Bachelor of Arts in 2008. She also studied for a few terms in Seattle Pacific University’s Master of Fine Arts in Creative Writing program, emphasizing Fiction as her track of study.

In January 2011 she joined the team at Expensify as their Marketing Associate, taking on not only an aggressive social media campaign but also providing support in customer help, staff morale programs, recruiting, and office management.
